website_summaries.verdict: These sandwich decrusters boast a double-sided design that adds a whole new dimension to crustless sandwiches.
pros: Dual sides can be used to cut or stamp sandwiches, pastries, pancakes, and more
Animal shapes are suitable for both boys and girls
Unique design allows for more creativity than most other sandwich decrusters
cons: Its smaller outline may make waste if no one is willing to eat the leftovers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !! kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her classmates loved this as a snack (pb and jelly) ... Super fun way to make their lunch special 😁 ! Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: tania ponce

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get over the cuteness! They're super easy to use, too. No complaints whatsoever...I'm a happy customer with a happy kid!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute cutouts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these food cutters because of their cuteness. They are simple to use, and perfect for little kids who don't like the crust on bread. It can make a simple ham/cheese sandwich look fun to eat! I made a Nutella sandwich for a snack with the little bear face and it came out just as pictured! <3
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is really cute and versatile! I got this set and have been making little sandwiches for my preschooler and we love it. It's really easy to use and the little poking stick really helps to easily get the small things out of the holes without any problems at all. We've made some adorable little sandwiches and the kids at school are totally jealous. I haven't used it yet on cookies or as an imprint on toast but i think it would be pretty cute. Even if I never use it that way it was still totally worth the money. Cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! I use these to make my daughter's sandwiches ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! I use these to make my daughter's sandwiches into fun shapes (hoping that will tempt her to eat more). It's very easy to cut out the face, even on very soft white bread. Just press down (use a good amount of pressure), and you'll see the imprint on the bread. Use the little pick to cut out the eyes, mouth, etc. So far, I've cut out pieces in cheese (use thicker harder cheese, don't use Kraft singles because it's too soft and will just melt), ham (again, thicker cuts tend to work better), and bread. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christina K

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok
customer_reviews.text: I would like to like it but it’s kinda hard to work with. I read the instructions and even read the reviews here for tips but I just can’t see myself using this all the time. The first attempt was for a on&just sandwich for my toddler and I used the bear mold. She didn’t like it and pushed the plate away. Prob got scared lol. I’ll try again when she’s a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Xutzen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fun for kids' lunch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was inspired by Japanese Bento ideas. My boys love the surprises I do for their lunch everyday. My younger one (3rd grade) told me their friends always want to see what he has for lunch. Very easy to use, very cute and fun.
customer_reviews.author: C4

customer_reviews.title: Cute Sandwich and Cookie Cutters
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this deco cutter and stamp kit to make sandwiches and cookies for our toddler. It took a few tries before I figured out how to use it to get clean cuts. The set is easy to clean the majority of the time. However, sometimes food residue is left behind and I have to use a small cleaning brush.
customer_reviews.author: crème.brûlée

customer_reviews.title: Takes more time, than just making a sammich.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to make some sammiches for the kids this last summer. I will admit I only did it once. It seemed to be more of a mess than I wanted. The cookie cutter worked great and I liked the whole idea of a bear or pig as the kids ate the sammiches. But I did not like all the work put into it. I wanted something easy to do. It was cute but not exactly the time efficient I wanted. These did turn out cute and the kids like them, I will say they have asked for them more often than I had time to make them.
customer_reviews.author: Lypiphera

customer_reviews.title: Great hit with 5 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is a big hit with my 5 year old daughter. It makes lunchtime fun for her at school. She gets to pick her animal, and i get to pick what goes into her sandwich. It is very easy to use. I recommend using the body outline to cut the bread , meat & cheese, etc first before assembling the sandwich. The face portion just needs to be used firmly and it gives a good cutout. If you use it for PB&J, definitely spread the sandwich after cutting. A great purchase. She is not a huge sandwich fan, but these get eaten no matter what i put in them.
customer_reviews.author: THEPRFCT10

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly with the panda sandwich cutter:. "Sandwich Cutter Taidea Cute Panda Pocket Bread Cutter, Hand Tools Sandwich Kit, Food Deco, Sandwich Mold, Sandwich Maker, Toast Mold Mould, Cookie Stamp Kit." Buy both, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Rpapa

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a very fun lunch!
customer_reviews.text: My kid LOVES these and they are so easy to use. I do feel a little bad about the amount of waste that these leave behind, but my dog doesn't seem to mind it since he gets the scraps!
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: The Kids' Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I would give these 5 stars but because the instructions aren't in English I have no idea how to comment on if they are dishwasher safe, etc. That is difficult for me to "guess" what I need to know about them. These are my kids' favorite set out of all of the bento cutters we have purchased. The cat and pig are their top picks. Tip: Allow grilled cheese to cool a little before cutting into it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: Cuts very well and kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: These were a completely spontaneous buy after they randomly popped up on my feed. We had no idea that something like this existed but we are very happy with this purchase.They work so well and our son loves it! We have only used the panda on bread so far, but the kid has nearly eaten a loaf of bread if that gives you any idea of how much he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: my sons really like their cold lunch right now! easy to use! lot of fun for me to make lunch for them!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The cutting side worked well for us. I couldn't quite get the stamp to work on the bread. But it may be the bread we use. Overall they are adorable and make it quick and easy to make a cute sandwhich.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: These are so adorable. They cut easily through the bread and cheese
customer_reviews.text: Just used this last night for my daughter's lunch. These are so adorable. They cut easily through the bread and cheese. The little poker is extremely helpful. Not sure how you'd get all the small pieces out otherwise. My only complaint is cleaning them; again, all those small bits. But my daughter loved it. Looking forward to using these on cookies.
customer_reviews.author: L. Oneal

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty easy to use. My toddler can push down on it and use it to decorate his own sandwiches, has so much fun the last few days since we got it. Does exactly what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mesa

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, but I wish a bit larger....I feel like I waste a lot of sandwich when using to make the kids lunch, so the remaining pieces I have to cut shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Panda party sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a panda birthday party. We used these with toast and Nutella to make some very cute sandwiches!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal F.

customer_reviews.title: So so fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My kids really love it when I make their favorite sandwiches with these cutters. I wish the plastic was a bit sharper, but it works for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: kel_per_83

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 and almost 7 year olds love these. I try to store all the pieces together, but inevitably find one piece out because they either used it or just like to look at the cute faces! On the nutritional side, I like to use these because although we use white bread, this reduces their intake of it, :) Also, the pick is necessary and I'm glad it was included in the package.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My son and apparently his entire class just LOVE when I use these to make his lunch. I've tried each shape with different fillings and all worked well however the cat does take some patience and the panda seems to work the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!! Move over lunchables!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE these! My daughter loves the sandwiches I make with them along with the edible markers that I use to mark the faces of these cute sandwiches. Her friends rave about them and wish their moms made them lunches like this too. I bought them to make my daughter's lunches more appealing...it worked!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old daughter loves to help me make ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves to help me make sandwiches. She likes to shape them with these. They have lasted us a year so far. She has been in the sandwich making business since 3 years old. The animal face sandwiches were a hit at my youngest daughter birthday party too.
customer_reviews.author: F.V.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: You can do so much with this set! They are super easy to use and clean. The tool it comes with is very useful. My toddler LOVES these!
customer_reviews.author: nova amory

customer_reviews.title: Great for bread or cookies.  Not so great for cheese
customer_reviews.text: Could not get these to cut cheese at all without it just crumbling apart. But worked great for cookies and bread. Wish it came with another 'outline' piece or I could buy another of just that so my nieces could cut the cookies at the same time. You can only do one at a time. Still adorable and they loved the pink piggy cookies.
customer_reviews.author: LD23

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this again. Its not easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: STACEY WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So cute! Work great for my sons lunches. He likes picking which ones to use. I recommend buying little baby nipple cleaning brushes or pipe cleaners for the small sections.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: A bit difficult for me to use
customer_reviews.text: Cookie is not my thingy so not sure if it is the dough I made. I could barely take cut them with these cutter and kept the animal shape.
customer_reviews.author: JEN HUANG

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this item
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this item! I have been using it for sandwiches, cookies, and putting the face impressions onto pancakes. My kids really enjoy the cute faces and with a little imagination you can create many unique things...5 stars! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra_Liptak

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to use specially if you like to make bentos. I've got a kid who loves sandwiches and this is perfect to use to decorate his snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Shariya Lorraine R. Magbiro

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality! Cut well and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery. Very good quality! Cut well and very easy to clean! Just perfect size for the bread out of Japan.It makes kids want to eat more. We are very happy with this product. I rated it 4 stars only because the pig face was missing in the pack. But thanks to Amazon's excellent service, we solved it in the same day. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kazuko Shiga

customer_reviews.title: Recommended. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is 101% if you need something like this...don't think twice. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Cute but quite small
customer_reviews.text: Cute food set. It did take quite a long time to arrive and some of the holes are a bit small to make clear indentations on food but it is cute none the less and it helps keep food time interesting for my toddler. Definite buy if you have a picky eater!
customer_reviews.author: Abi A

customer_reviews.title: It gets my son to be less picky!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing ever and my seven year old LOVES it, he's always been a picky eater but I've noticed that when I make his food "fun looking" he always eats it all! I disagree that the size is not substantial, honestly it does remove the crust- but either I or my fiance just eat it. So it's a win-win situation in my book.
customer_reviews.author: jenna morgan jones

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and very easy to use. My kids who wouldn't touch their boring food will down 2 and 3 sandwiches with these and they love to be involved too.
customer_reviews.author: andrea6600

customer_reviews.title: You must own this
customer_reviews.text: I had so much trouble getting my son to eat cats and frogs. With this, he believes that cats and frogs are just sandwhiches and he eats them up!!!! The animals look very realistic and sometimes we are very sure we hear animal noises coming out of the sandwich tray in my kids lunchbox!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. GROVE

customer_reviews.title: Animal friends food cutter
customer_reviews.text: I like this cutter. I got it last week and used it on pancakes. They turned out great. We have a picky eater so I am trying this in hope that he will eat a little more. I have not tried it on bread, not sure how that will turn out. I make homemade bread, but I see that some of the reviews mention the cheap bread, which we do not use. I am not too worried about it, because there are plenty of things that we can use this cutter for, like pancakes, omelettes, cheese...
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I am now the coolest Mom in the first grade ...
customer_reviews.text: I am now the coolest Mom in the first grade thanks to this food deco cutter. The neighbor kids will come over and request that I make them panda or frog sandwiches for snacks. The resulting sandwich is quite small and a lot of bread is cut away, but that just means that I get to pack 2 cute sandwiches instead!
customer_reviews.author: jenn bush

customer_reviews.title: I would totally recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I use this regularly for my kid's lunches. I would totally recommend this product. I use it for sandwiches and tortillas. It's simple to use and makes a cute lunch/snack.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a little patience. Makes you feel like super mom.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I feel like super mom and make my kid cute lunches with these cutouts. It does take some patience...and there's been quite a few times that the entire thing tore while I was trying to make a whisker, but my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: munkeyhoots

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. My 2 and 3 yr old actually ate their sandwiches. They usually only take two bites then throw them. I'm very happy with my purchase and would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: "Kids love them, Mothers approve them". It makes the meal that much more appealing and more happy to ingest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's all in the wrist
customer_reviews.text: Works great for making sandwiches for my little one. I have made PB&J and Ham & Cheese sandwiches with these and they work great. Just got to slice each piece/layer indiviually prior to stacking them up.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Cutest things and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Cutest things and easy to use. Makes great looking PB&J sandwiches. I make them all the time for my son's lunches. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Dad makes lunches for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: dad loves to make lunches with the kiddos for the family. A healthier alternative to making cookies together. kids eat there lunch and since they are packed in the morning; they are quick to pull out of the fridge and eat.
customer_reviews.author: Granny925

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, my son enjoys seeing it in his lunch box and helping me make it! So easy to use with the plastic toothpick piece.
customer_reviews.author: Carpenter Family

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to use for preschooler lunch
customer_reviews.text: I found this cutter set very easy to use for my 3 year-old's lunch. It makes her sandwich the right size and shape for the bento box we use. The patterns are so cute that our picky eater can't resist eating the sandwiches. It's easier to use on fresh bread, though, esp the ones from Asian bakeries with more butter content. Older or supermarket bread sometimes leaves jagged edges. We also use cheese or jam/sunflower butter with the bread. Meat may be a little harder to cut since it's not very sharp for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: CraftMom

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to make the food fun at my daughters 4th birthday party. They are easy to use, easy to clean and because they are sharp enough to cut bread lunch meat, hamburger patties, cheese, apple slices etc. but not little fingers, my daughter was able to help, which made her feel important. There was also a little note in the box from the seller on how to make an octopus with the provided cutters, very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J.

customer_reviews.title: Came just as advertised and are extremely easy, and fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: Came just as advertised and are extremely easy, and fun to use. They can also be used as templates when frosting cookies or decorating fruit slices (think large slice of watermelon and then add a face to it).
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Evans

customer_reviews.title: Finally, lunch without fights!
customer_reviews.text: I can finally pack my 1st grader a sandwich that she wants to eat! These cutters are great. Very high quality, easy to throw in the top rack of the dishwasher. I wish I had thought to buy them years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Crm

customer_reviews.title: I use these to make sandwiches for my kids and they LOVE them. They each pick a face they want ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my kids favorites! I use these to make sandwiches for my kids and they LOVE them. They each pick a face they want and help me making the sandwiches. Amazing cutters!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Cha

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: i used this on toasted bread. one side toasted the other side still soft. i stamped the soft side. if you want to remove the eyes/ears, try it with a tooth pick.
customer_reviews.author: RooBear

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Making sandwiches for my bento box has never been more fun. It's very easy to use and clean. Cutting up cheese is a little tricky; it tends to stick to the plastic, but it cuts up bread and meat just fine.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rutschman

customer_reviews.title: Cute but lot of wastage of bread
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute product but it seems to me that there is a lot of wastage of bread. Also when pressing the smaller eyes and ear hole deform the bread too much. Though it does make the food more attractive to our kid.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect! My daughter ate extras thanks to the pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! My daughter ate extras thanks to the pretty cuts and it is sooo quick to put together without getting fiddly with the detailed bits. Highly recommended purchase if you have kids.
customer_reviews.author: varudhini

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Bigger
customer_reviews.text: The kids really like these, but I wish they were a little bigger so there wasn't so much of the sandwich wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Candace ~ Book Addict Haven

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great quality, instant hit with my kiddos from morning toast to cute little sandwiches at lunch. I must have for making food fun!
customer_reviews.author: MamacitaBonita

customer_reviews.title: Make lunch time fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this set! It helps makes my children's lunches just that more special. I would recommend these! They are easy to use and a great and quick way to make lunch time fun!
customer_reviews.author: GaffMom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to make sandwiches to go in the bento boxes for my girls lunches. Even my 6th and 8th graders ask for the cute little faces, lol. They can also be used to make little pies, cookies, cake cut outs, and so much more!
customer_reviews.author: C. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: It's Awesome! Kids love them and mom likes to show them off!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years old twins never really learned to like eating sandwiches until they had "bear" sandwiches! Awesome kit, super easy to use. I feel like a rockstar every time I make them! Huge hit with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: FDM

customer_reviews.title: These may be better for something like cheese
customer_reviews.text: Tried using these with bread and even with the little poker tool you don't get clean details. These may be better for something like cheese.
customer_reviews.author: MamaStox

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My daughter loves seeing which animal she gets in her lunchbox each day! Huge hit at my house!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly klaboe

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Used this product today for the first time. My 3 yr old and I made breakfast using it. She had a lot of fun and it was very easy for her to use. My 6 yr old loved seeing his panda breakfast. They said breakfast was so fun, silly and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Martinez

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: These little cutters are cute for sending sandwiches to my daughters school for lunch or when she has snacks at home. The best part is she wants to make the food instead of me! It's a sneaky way to get her to help out more! ha ha!
customer_reviews.author: T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Makes super cute sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: Makes super cute sandwiches! My two girls(ages 1 and 5) Both think it awesome! It only takes about two extra minutes in the mornings to cut out the sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: izzdad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cute and am looking forward to making cute lunches for my boyfriend!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works and it's easy to use, you just have to have a small amount of filling.
customer_reviews.author: Merari Hirner

customer_reviews.title: Makes lunch time fun
customer_reviews.text: We love using this adorable set to add some excitement to our daughter's lunch. My only complaint is that the cutters are not sharp enough to cut veggies, but it was clear these wouldn't do that from the description.
customer_reviews.author: GreenMama

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this! Strong clean plastic that works wonderfully with ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Strong clean plastic that works wonderfully with soft breads. The fun shapes has helped a ton with getting my son to enjoy eating more. He's not a picky eater, he's just always moving moving moving! Having some cute to snack has made it much more fun for him. His favorite is the kitty :D
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hayes

customer_reviews.title: It's appealing.
customer_reviews.text: It makes making sandwiches fun and more decorative for children, more appealing for them to eat. My kids loves the design, although it cuts small and wasting the rest of the bread.
customer_reviews.author: Dickers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Super cute. Easy to clean in my dishwasher or by hand. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aneisha Coburn

customer_reviews.title: Cute !
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for making sandwiches for school! :) Super cute as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute way to make lunch fun for the kids. Can be a little work cleaning all these parts.
customer_reviews.author: gravytrain

customer_reviews.title: These cutters are so adorable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are so adorable and easy to use. I've been using these in bento’s for my mom’s lunch. For someone with a short lunch period and trying to watch their weight bento boxes are a good way to stay on track. So I have been making her bento boxes and have used these cutters a few times now she comes back saying “thank you” everyday and “they are so cute! Everyone at work is jealous of me now.” These are also great for picky kids; the shapes make it more fun to eat.
customer_reviews.author: utsuki zetsumei

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase, not only they work for decoration for sandwiches, but they could also be used to make cuties and a lot of other pastries. The plastic is of a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: ElManchi

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Too cute! This product has been an excellent addition to our kitchen. Easy to use and kid friendly :)
customer_reviews.author: EdnCity

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine in the mail and my daughter instantly asked for a sandwich! Too cute :)
customer_reviews.author: Carsley

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy.
customer_reviews.text: These are great fun. Use the little tool to clear eyes/ears/whiskers before you pull the large face tool. Just easier that way.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Larcombe

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for many months with great success. I love the crisp cutouts they make and how many options there are. I particularly love pairing them with CuteZCute's panda sandwich sealer - perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McVay

customer_reviews.title: So adorable, a must have for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: These work best when you flatten the bread a little. My daughter finally looks forward to her lunch every day now!
customer_reviews.author: Trendymom

customer_reviews.title: Came on time and is deliciously adorable!
customer_reviews.text: As the title reads it comes on time and is so easy to use! It comes in a tiny box with everything the picture includes. A bear outline cutter accompanied with a panda, cat, pig and frog head. As well as the punch out stick. It's fun easy and cute and perfect for lunches! CuteZCute also sends a long a thank you note and yeah that's pretty much it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: so cute ! and a lot Ideas to use it !
customer_reviews.text: I love it !, and so many ideas at the Facebook page cutezcute ! my daughter love it !... of course me too lol... and is fun to do it
customer_reviews.author: Paola Coots

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much we bought a second one as a gift
customer_reviews.author: JennyJenny220

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I'm having so much fun making cute sandwiches for my Kindergartner with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mishka

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of making something so cute like this every day for work!! It came in it's own package and I like waking up every day to make myself lunch for work every single day:)
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Marquez

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: These have been very fun. My oldest loves the cutouts in her lunch. They're easy to use and most things work well with them.
customer_reviews.author: review98

customer_reviews.title: Missing a part
customer_reviews.text: These are great and my son loves them. My only issue is that the package came with an extra panda face instead of a pig face.
customer_reviews.author: Dad of 2 boy's

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Idea
customer_reviews.text: These are Great. I can't wait to create super cute lunches for me to eat, or my nieces/nephew when they visit.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I love the sandwiches made from them
customer_reviews.text: Very very cute. I love the sandwiches made from them. All the eyes and mouths and everything come out as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this thing is so simple, my little cousin, who is 5, can make her own cute sandwiches for lunch every day easily without anybody's help.
customer_reviews.author: Karen94

customer_reviews.title: Fun and my boys love them

product_meta.title: CuteZCute Animal Friends Food Deco Cutter and Stamp Kit
product_meta.description: All-in-one decorative cooking tool that works with all types of users needs from bread, cookie, rice, meat, cheese, pancake, thin-sliced vegetable, fruit leather, watermelon and more. Great for both a beginner and a pro bento-err to create cute food fast. The Cute Animals shapes entices picky eaters to want eat and explore new foods. Top rack Dishwasher safe. This is a 6-piece set that includes cutters/stampers and an assistant pick. - 1 outer face cutter (frame) 3 7/8 x 3 1/8 inch wide x 1 1/16 inch deep - 4 animal friends characters cutters and stamps (panda, cat, frog, pig) that can be used as a food cutter and a bread stamper. One side is sharper and used as a food cutter, while the other side is used as a stamper for bread, cookie, pastry press and more. 3.50 x 3.75 x 1.29 inch deep - 1 cute happy panda assistant pick, help you clean the product by poking out the leftover food that may get stuck. 3.25 inch long Use this set as a bread stamp, sandwich cutter, thin-sliced meat cutter, hamburger mold, rice mold, seasoning (spice or furikake) mold, cheese cutter, cookie cutter and stamp, pastry press, play dough mold and many more. How to use - For stamping, use the stamp side to press on soft bread or use as pastry press. This function allows you to create cute bread within a few seconds. For example, breakfast toast or sandwich. Great for a busy persons. - For cutter, use the longer bevel side of the cutter to cut. Twist the cutter back and forth (with pressure) Use the assistant pick to help release the food out of the cutter without damaging the shape. The small cut-out can be used to create many different shapes and characters. - When cutting delicate food like cheese, use the included panda assistant pick and apply small pressure to tap out the food. Multiple taps around the edges of the shape will help clean release of the food out of the mold.
feature_bullets: All-in-one Bento Multifunction Cooking Tool - Cookie Cutter, Rice Mold, Sandwich Cutter and more
Use to stamp Bread, Cookies and Pie to make cute happy Animal faces indentation
Cute assistant Panda Pick to help ensure Clean detail cutouts
Complete 6 piece kit for creating Pig, Panda, Cat and Frog shaped food
Fully BPA Free, Food Grade, Top Rack Dishwasher Safe, International SGS Certified, Designed in the USA

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
